title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: Flashing issue when resizing the window vertically in the Control Example.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window vertically only, I have observed excessive flashing. Specifically, all the tabs in the TabFolder and all the frames flash.
EB: I expect a smooth resizing experience without any flashing when resizing the window vertically in the Control Example.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Run the Control Example.
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only.
3. Observe that all the tabs in the TabFolder and all the frames flash.
